books_list.title: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python
books_list.author: Al Sweigart
books_list.subject: Python Programming
books_list.comments: Great book on how to automate yourself into a new job! I used this book to do just that.

books_list.title: A Long Way Gone: Memoirs of a Boy Soldier
books_list.author: Ishmael Beah
books_list.subject: Memoir
books_list.comments: I went to college with the author and played intramural soccer with him not having the slightest idea of his past.

books_list.title: Difficult Subjects: Insights and Strategies for Teaching About Race, Sexuality, and Gender
author: Badia Ahad-Legardy
OiYan A. Poon
Lori Patton Davis
books_list.subject: Education
books_list.comments: My sister is one of the editors to this anthology of academic essays
